metadata.title: STATOM - Modern Modular Homes
metadata.description: High-quality modular homes for comfortable living. We design, produce and install modern, energy-efficient housing solutions.

title.part1: Prestige, comfort, and harmony with nature — all in one

hero.description: Choose a home that reflects your values — modern, sustainable, and built for a conscious lifestyle, where luxury meets responsibility.

choice.description: Explore a selection of proven solutions for comfortable living. Our catalog features modern modular homes designed to suit different needs and lifestyles. Choose your home — we'll take care of the rest.

title.part1: Our modular homes are your new

display.description: Forget long construction times and endless hassle. Our modular homes are built quickly, efficiently, and with top-quality materials, ensuring durability and modern design. Enjoy a cozy, stylish space that adapts to your needs while saving you time and effort. Move in faster and live better with a home designed for your comfort.

imageSection.description: Our eco-homes combine modern technology with care for the environment. They are energy-efficient, comfortable, and built from sustainable materials. You'll reduce your carbon footprint without compromising on comfort. Invest in the future — choose a home that works for you and the planet.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.q: How long does it take to build a modular home?
items.a: The construction time for a modular home is typically 30-60 days, depending on the size and complexity of the project.

items.q: What is the warranty on the house?
items.a: We offer a comprehensive 10-year warranty on the structure and 2 years on all installed systems.

items.q: What materials are used for construction?
items.a: We use only high-quality, certified, and environmentally friendly materials that meet the highest quality standards.

items.q: Does a modular home require a special foundation?
items.a: Yes, modular homes require a specially adapted foundation that we plan and create after a thorough site analysis.

items.q: Can the house layout be customized?
items.a: Yes, our modular homes offer flexible floor plan options that can be adapted to your individual needs.

items.q: Can the house be relocated after installation?
items.a: Yes, our modular homes are designed to be moved to a new location if needed.
We offer various payment options, including installment payments without surcharge and customized financing solutions.

items.q: What utilities can be connected to the house?
items.a: Our houses are designed for all modern utilities: electricity, water, sewage, internet, and smart home systems.

items.q: Can a modular home be installed anywhere?
items.a: In principle yes, but local building regulations and site conditions must be considered. We conduct a site analysis beforehand.

items.q: Do you provide installation and connection services?
items.a: Yes, we offer a complete service from installation to connection of all utilities.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Get in touch with us for a consultation or to order your modular home. We're always here to help!
contacts.about1:
Our company's roots began in 1993. At that time, in the rapidly developing construction market, the newly established company started its activities in heating technology, plumbing, water supply, and sewage systems. It was one of the first in Lithuania to introduce modern heating equipment from Junkers, Viessman, and Buderus. During its development, the company built and renovated houses, installed internal and external sewage systems, and eventually began providing interior finishing services. Currently, since 2016, the revived company continues its operations in Hamburg, Germany.
We are deeply involved in the application of modern, advanced, and ecological materials and technologies in construction. As subcontractors, we participate in the construction of fast-built block and wooden houses. For interior finishing, as well as for kitchen and bathroom equipment, we use modern and natural materials made of stone, quartz, and ceramics.
contacts.about2: By choosing us, you are not just getting a house—you are getting a high-quality, modern, and cozy living space. We believe that the future belongs to modular homes, and we are doing everything to make that future a reality today!

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building the Future Together: High-Quality Modular Homes for Comfortable Living

paragraphs.p1: Our company's roots began in 1993. At that time, in the rapidly developing construction market, the newly established company started its activities in heating technology, plumbing, water supply, and sewage systems. It was one of the first in Lithuania to introduce modern heating equipment from Junkers, Viessman, and Buderus. During its development, the company built and renovated houses, installed internal and external sewage systems, and eventually began providing interior finishing services. Currently, since 2016, the revived company continues its operations in Hamburg, Germany.
paragraphs.p2: We delve into the application of modern, advanced and ecological materials and technologies in the construction industry. As subcontractors, we participate in the construction of prefabricated block and wooden houses. For interior decoration, as well as for kitchen and bathroom equipment, we use modern and natural materials from stone, quartz and ceramics.

paragraphsBottom.p1: We follow a turnkey approach, offering a full range of services—from developing a personalized project to delivering and installing the home. Every project is tailored to meet the needs of the customer, ensuring that each home exceeds expectations.
paragraphsBottom.p2: As we continue to grow, we remain committed to setting new benchmarks in modular home construction. Our goal is not just to build houses but to create modern, adaptable, and future-ready living spaces that evolve with our customers' lifestyles. By integrating cutting-edge technology and advanced building techniques, we are redefining the way people think about homeownership.
paragraphsBottom.p3: Join us in shaping the future of housing. With our expertise, passion, and customer-first approach, we are confident that we can help you find a home that perfectly suits your needs. The future is modular, and we are here to build it together!
